branchCategory.name: JT
branchCategory.description: <p>Series JT is a light weight, compact floating joint with an aluminum case suitable for 20, 25, 32, and 40mm bore air cylinders.  The JT compensates for any misalignment between the work piece and the air cylinder.</p>

branchItem.name: JT, Floating Joint, Standard, Lightweight/Compact
branchItem.description: <p>Series JT is a light weight, compact floating joint with an aluminum case suitable for 20, 25, 32, and 40mm bore air cylinders.  The JT compensates for any misalignment between the work piece and the air cylinder.</p>
